Detailed Description

Definition at line 15 of file CShapeControl.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum iview::CShapeControl::ShapeTransformMode

Describe how shape tranformation is interpreted.

Enumerator:
STM_VIEW 

Shape transformation will be ignored, view transformation will be used.

STM_SHAPE 

View transformation will be ignored, shape transformation will be used.

STM_COMBINE 

Both transformation will be used, shape transformation will be used as local transformation.

Definition at line 23 of file CShapeControl.h.

Definition at line 165 of file CShapeControl.h.

References AreTransformsValid(), and CalcTransforms().

const i2d::CAffine2d & iview::CShapeControl::GetLogToViewTransform ( ) const [inline, virtual]

Get logical units to view transformation.

This transformation converts logical units to view coordinate system. Please note, that it is only affine transformation, not a calibration. You can use it as a calibration only, when linear transformation is enough. To get transformation to convert logical units to screen pixel, use GetLogToScreenTransform().

Implements iview::ILogicalCoords.
